name: Cubic Avoid
description:
Patches of lava are coming up from the floor! Can you memorize the pattern and avoid the lava for 100 seconds?

Controls
  • Use the arrow keys to move the cube
  • Avoid the lava by memorizing the pattern
  • Don't fall off the platform
Developer's Note

This game took me a while because I tried to make a fitting BGM . After a while I thought that I will never finish this game if I'm gonna make a BGM. So, I released it now to move on and make a new game.

I'm new to Itch.io and game development, so I'm trying to improve my skills every time!
